Reviews.Title: BlackBerry 8310
Reviews.Author: Purp_Mane(tm)
Reviews.Content: I currently own a BlackBerry 8310, the only con is that fact that there isn't any Wi-Fi capabilities, discard that fact and you will have a great cell phone! (i rate it 4.9/5 Stars)

Reviews.Title: LIAR
Reviews.Author: keideron
Reviews.Content: My comment is negative. The seller offered a refurbished and unlocked phone, but rather sent me a  very used and blocked cellular I could not use. The supplier is a liar and not recommend it.I tried to reach an agreement with him but in vain.

Reviews.Title: Full of Regret
Reviews.Author: Irie
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone based on "Game Lovers" rating and the general statement made on Amazon.com regarding this product. Game Lover stated the product was in good condition and that there was a scratch on the screen (which was accurate) The phone appeared to be in good condition, HOWEVER, a valuable piece of information was not included. The phone constantly shows an hourglass spinning. The only time it did not constantly spin was when I was able to actually place a phone call. Otherwise, using the phone for web based functions was a JOKE! I understand that this may be a glitch in the model, but through research it appeared to me that it should not have been as frequent as it was. Suffice to say, I am sure the previous owner knew about this and failed to indicate this malfunction. An attempted email to the owner was not returned, so, I strongly discourage anyone from buying any type of product from this individual. Thank you and have a nice day!

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve
Reviews.Author: hotbabbb
Reviews.Content: The Blackberry Curve is good, but not as good as the Blackberry Bold 9000.  I still recommend the Blackberry much better than Iphone as a professional use.  Iphone is more for younger generations.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Fran Mcdonald
Reviews.Content: Great product, an oldie but a goodie. Got it for my 9 year old daughter and she just loves it.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve 8310
Reviews.Author: Eddy
Reviews.Content: Still using this phone and it is still fully operational. I only use it now to make and receive calls. In the earlies it use to freeze for some strange reason and the battery would run down. Now it takes 2 days before it dies. It takes long to boot up whenever the battery is pulled like with all other blackberry. For an older model blackberry this phone might not be an interesting buy since some apps (whatsapp) now no longer work with this model since the OS can't upgrade higher than 4.5

Reviews.Title: What a load...
Reviews.Author: Riddlez81
Reviews.Content: Technical Details"This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.""Return reason: Defective/Does not work properlyBuyer comments: Phone is not fully functional. Was originally an at&t; phone, was unlocked, but does not fully function with other networks."I bought this phone thinking that it may work with my T-Mobile network, but it did not. When I contacted them about returning it, I was told that I would not be refunded the shipping cost and there would be a 20% restocking fee. I originally paid $30 + $5.09 shipping. Not too bad, but I printed out the return label and I have to pay for the return shipping. What crap. In my opinion, if you don't refund me the shipping cost, you should pay the return shipping.This company is a joke. FAIL

Reviews.Title: product review
Reviews.Author: r voyer
Reviews.Content: The item was listed as nicely refurbished after recieving the phone it was not very good.Item was returned for replacement and was replaced quickly and the new phone is as stated  nicely refubished.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy : does not work
Reviews.Author: sm
Reviews.Content: I bought this Blackberry as a gift. But the battery did not charge from the very first day. i had to return and buy another gift at the lastI would not recommend anyone to buy this product

Reviews.Title: thought it worked with Boost Mobile
Reviews.Author: E. King "ek426"
Reviews.Content: should've read the entire description - inevitably switched to AT&T; but now can't use BBMworks fine otherwisewould recommend seller

Reviews.Title: Good phone except.........
Reviews.Author: maxtux
Reviews.Content: I can't send or recieve picture messages with this phone for some reason. I have T-Mobile as my service provider.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
2G GSM: 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
QWERTY keyboard, Trackball navigation, Blackberry Maps, Document viewer (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF), Media player (MP4/WMV/H.263/H.264/MP3/WAV/eAAC+/WMA), Organizer.
Camera: 2 MP, 1600x1200 pixels, LED flash.
Internal Memory: 64 MB ROM, MicroSD expandable (4 GB max).
ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry Curve 8310 Unlocked Phone with Bluetooth, 2MP Camera and GPS
